title: BANNED ACCOUNT
body: Anyone know how long it takes for riot support to respond for a ticket I got banned for no reason and not getting a reply is rather not great customer service

replies.body: Takes 3-4 days typically. First a normal support person gets it, then the person sends it to a Behavior Specialist  which takes an extra day.

Our specialists address tickets on a first-come-first-served basis, so response times can vary depending on when you submitted your ticket and how many tickets have been submitted lately. If you remain patient, one of our specialists will reach back out in your ticket when possible.

If you have any other questions, let me know.
